metadata.feature_description: Automatically generates and updates thumbnail previews of template pages using html2canvas

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify thumbnails display in template list

steps.expected: Templates page should load with thumbnails for each template
steps.actual: Templates page loaded showing all templates with thumbnail previews. Each template displays a miniature preview of the page layout generated via html2canvas.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify medium and large thumbnail sizes

steps.expected: Medium-sized thumbnails should display in the grid
steps.actual: Medium thumbnails displayed in the template list grid showing preview of each template page

steps.action: Click on a template to view large thumbnail
steps.expected: A larger thumbnail preview should appear
steps.actual: Clicking on 'Cavalier - Main' template displayed a large thumbnail popup showing the full page preview with navigation bar, content areas, and footer visible

steps.expected: Add Template dialog should appear with template selection showing thumbnails
steps.actual: Add Template dialog appeared showing template selection with thumbnails for all available base templates

steps.action: Fill in template name 'Thumbnail Gen Test 2026' and description, select base template
steps.actual: Form accepted template name 'Thumbnail Gen Test 2026', description, and had 'Cavalier - Main' selected as base template

steps.expected: Template should be created and thumbnail should be automatically generated using html2canvas
steps.actual: Template created successfully. Console logs confirmed html2canvas activity (Canvas2D warnings from html2canvas.js). New template 'Thumbnail Gen Test 2026' appeared in the list with an automatically generated thumbnail.

steps.action: Click on newly created template to view large thumbnail
steps.expected: Large thumbnail should display for the new template
steps.actual: Large thumbnail preview displayed showing the full page layout of the newly created template with navigation, content areas, and trial warning message visible

steps.action: Create a new template and observe thumbnail generation
steps.actual: When creating the template, console logs showed html2canvas processing activity with 'Canvas2D: Multiple readback operations' warnings from html2canvas.js:2761, confirming thumbnail generation was occurring in the background

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Handle validation error during template creation

steps.action: Attempt to create template with name that exists in Recycle Bin
steps.actual: Error message displayed: 'A template with this name exists in the Recycle Bin. To restore this template use the Recycle Bin.' - System correctly prevents duplicate names and provides actionable guidance.

observations: Thumbnail generation uses html2canvas library as documented, confirmed via console log activity showing Canvas2D operations
All templates in the list display generated thumbnails showing page layout previews
Two thumbnail sizes are available: medium (in list view) and large (on click/preview)
Thumbnails show the DNN admin bar, navigation, content panes, and footer areas in the preview
External URL templates scenario was not directly testable - no UI option found to create an external URL template from the Templates section
Failed thumbnail generation scenario would require a condition that causes html2canvas to fail (e.g., CORS issues, missing resources) - not easily reproducible via normal UI interaction
Template thumbnail update on changes was not explicitly tested as it would require modifying template content, but the infrastructure for generation is confirmed working
